content: skull-in-tine *¨`* ☠ *¨`* ………… wishing you the skull iest day ever ☠ ✿ *☠`* ¯`v´¯ ☠ ¯`v´¯ *☠`* ✿ ✿ *☠`* ¸ ¯`v´¯ ¸ ´*☠`* ✿ ………… … ¸ ´ … ………… this pattern is © 2023 to ann wanamaker please do not sell copy or publish this pattern for resale size 10 crochet thread 1 65mm hook stitch guide - sts st- stitches stitch - chain chain stitch - slip_stitch slip_stitch - single_crochet single_crochet - half_double_crochet half_double_crochet - double_crochet --double_crochet - 2dctog two double_crochet together -yarn over insert the hook into the next stitch yarn over draw the yarn through the stitch yarn over draw the yarn through 2 loops on the hook yarn over insert hook in same space yarn over draw the yarn through the 2 loops yarn over draw the yarn through the 3 remaining loops on the hook row 1 ch5 join to form a ring ch4 2dctog ch2 twice 2dctog treble_crochet in loop just made ch4 turn row 2 2dctog ch2 2dctog in next chain space this will be called a shell throughout ch3 shell in next chain space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn row 3 shell in next chain space ch2 double_crochet ch4 double_crochet in next chain space ch2 shell in next shell space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn row 4 shell in next shell space ch2 skip chain space 7dc in next chain space ch2 skip chain space shell in next shell space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn <<< row 3 and 4 row 5 shell in next shell space ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch1 skip st double_crochet in next st twice ch1 skip st 2dctog in next st ch2 skip chain space shell in next shell space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn 2 row 6 shell in next shell space ch3 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch1 skip chain space double_crochet in next st twice ch1 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch3 skip chain space shell in next shell space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn row 7 shell in next shell space ch2 2dctog in next chain space half_double_crochet single_crochet in next st single_crochet in each of next 5 sts / chain sps single_crochet half_double_crochet in next st 2dctog in next chain space ch2 shell in next shell space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn row 8 shell ch2 2dctog in next shell space ch3 skip chain space 2hdc in next st single_crochet in each of next 4sts ch4 skip next st single_crochet in each of next 3sts single_crochet half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet in next st ch2 skip chain space shell ch2 2dctog in next shell space treble_crochet in next chain space ch4 turn row 9 shell in next shell space ch3 shell in next shell space ch2 skip chain space 2dctog in next st ch5 half_double_crochet in chain space ch5 skip next 4sts 2dctog in next st ch2 skip
